title: Chapter 1345 - A Punch Sends Him Flying
volume_title: His Sword Takes Aim A The Three Thousand Worlds Of The Stars, Suppressing Foes Both Past And Present
body:
Chapter 1345 - A Punch Sends Him Flying

Determine life and death and sever enmities!

Su Yi’s words were light and airy, yet they contained incontrovertible power.

The entire area sank deeper into deathly silence. Countless people watched with bated breath.

“Please permit me to test the Temple Master first!” said the Painter, facing the other three. His eyes flashed with divine light.

With his handsome features and snow-white robes, he cut an elegant figure.

And when he spoke, his presence transformed.

Boom!

The skies shook violently. Ink-black immortal light surged forth, transforming into an ink-wash painting in front of the Painter.

Within the painting, Laws of the Grand Dao condensed into lotuses on the verge of blooming. They seemed to sway, as if they might come to life at a moment’s notice.

An oppressive pressure swept outward, blanketing the entire area like a hurricane.

“His foundations and aura would have been first-rate even by the standards of antiquity. At the same level of cultivation, less than one in ten thousand could match him!” 

Some of the revenants of ancient factions looked stunned.

In life, they’d been prominent experts of the Path of Transcendence. They could tell at a glance that the Painter’s Nascent Divinity Realm foundations were tempered to incomparable...
original_title: Chapter 1345 - A Punch Sends Him Flying
